trans-unit.source: Converts the members of an <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of Boolean values to and from instances of <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Converte i membri di una <xref:System.Collections.IList>raccolta di valori booleani in e da istanze di <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The converted <xref:System.String> is a sequence of delimited zeros and ones; zero indicates false and one indicates true.
trans-unit.target: Convertito <xref:System.String>Ã¨ una sequenza di zero e uno delimitati; zero indica false e uno indica true.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This class is only intended to be used by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> for serialization of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Questa classe solo deve essere utilizzata dal <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>per la serializzazione di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Converters.BoolIListConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Converters.BoolIListConverter"> </xref> classe.
